lines: ...I have seen you in my dreams, traveler.
All is in accordance with their design. Mol Iloh is your home.
Today's enemies are tomorrow's allies. Remember this.
The gods saw fit to return you to us. But what of your comrades? Where are they?
A new day dawns, and with it new challenges...
You have passed through your trials here unscathed, it is true. But every star must follow its own course. Be ready.
Cirina told me of the samurai's fate. You have my deepest condolences, child.

The design can be difficult to discern for those within it. So it was when Cirina brought Hien unto us, bleeding and broken. Yet from that tragedy he rose, strong and resolute, and reclaimed what was lost...
To the ends of the world and back again... Yes, we know of your deeds in the West. What will come of them, only the gods know, but for now...welcome home.
Strange... Amidst the radiance of your being, I sense a shadow. I pray it is but my imagination.
On the matter of Nhaama's power and the alliance, the gods have remained silent. That is their way of telling us to choose with our hearts.
